We need to produce JSON with summary, business_intent, keywords list. The class is TestDataLayer. It seems to be a test data layer providing helper methods for creating, retrieving, updating, deleting various entities: element, step, user, feedback, thread, thread_author. Also building debug URL. So summary: Provides utility functions for managing test data objects in a data store, facilitating CRUD operations and related helpers for testing. Business intent: To simplify test setup and teardown by abstracting data layer interactions, enabling creation, retrieval, update, deletion of domain entities for automated tests. Keywords: test data, CRUD, helper, create, get, update, delete, element, step, user, feedback, thread, debug URL, upsert, list, data layer.
